name: Additional contents
text:
§431:10-216    A policy may contain additional provisions, which are not inconsistent with this part, and which are:



	(1)	Required to be inserted by the laws of the insurer's state of domicile; or
	(2)	Appropriate or necessary to state the rights and obligations of the parties to the contract. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
